problem.p: A block is suspended by a single vertical string from the ceiling. Which force forms a "Newton's 3rd law pair" with the weight of the block?

choice.name: foil1
choice.text: the weight of the block has no "Newton's 3rd law pair" because the block is in equilibrium

choice.name: foil2
choice.text: the force of tension in the string acting on the block

choice.name: foil3
choice.text: the normal force from the ceiling acting on the string

choice.name: foil4
choice.text: the gravitational force exerted on the block by the Earth

choice.name: foil5
choice.text: the gravitational force exerted on the Earth by the block
